channel.title: Homes on Longqi Yang
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Longqi Yang

item.description: I am a Ph.D. candidate in the Computer Science Department, Cornell University and Cornell Tech. I am very fortunate to be advised by Prof. Deborah Estrin, and be a member of the small data lab and the Connected Experiences lab (Cx lab). I am driven to build intelligent information systems (e.g., recommender systems, personal assistants, and their applications, from education to wellness) that address individual, commercial, and societal needs, and to understand limitations and real-world impacts of algorithmic suggestions.

item.title: Teaching
